reviews.review_msg: I had her as A grade 8 English teacher , she loved to pick sides and was an unfair and arbitrary marker. Loved to mock and from the recent comments I can tell she hasn't changed. BEWARE THAT JUST BY HAVING HER, YOUR AVERAGES WILL DROP !!!

Great course. A little inconsistent in terms of reading load - some weeks were very light and some were killer.  Very supportive and attentive.  Interesting, well constructed course.  Good balance of literature, theory, and other media.
